program1.api

Interface Computer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComputerImpl

    public interface Computer
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    Generic interface of a Computer 'Server' that can exucute generic Tasks
    Author:
    Michael, Roman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PORT
      The default port on which to start RMI (1099)
      static java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
      The default name of the Remote to register in RMI

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T execute(Task<T> task)
      Executes a generic Task

        The default port on which to start RMI (1099)

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        <T> T execute(Task<T> task)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Executes a generic Task
        Parameters:
        task - to execute where T is the intended return type
        Returns:
        result as type T which is specified by task
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there is a RMI communication error
